title: unix: compilation error due to missing build tags
body:
Reported here by @apetruhin: https://github.com/golang/sys/commit/33267e036fd93fcd26ea95b7bdaf2d8306cb743c#commitcomment-17485453

Looks like build tags need to be added to some of the new s390x files so that old versions of the compiler can compile the package correctly.

CL to follow.
